com.poesys.db.dao.update
Interface IUpdateBatch<T extends IDbDto>

Type Parameters:
T - the type of IDbDto to update
All Known Implementing Classes:
UpdateBatchByKey, UpdateCacheBatchByKey, UpdateMemcachedBatchByKey
public interface IUpdateBatch<T extends IDbDto>

An interface for a Command pattern class that updates a batch of data transfer objects (DTOs) in the database. The implementation identifies the objects to update based on the primary key contained in the DTO. The concrete implementation should specify what aspects of the object it updates. The implementation should update a specific DTO in the database if the DTO has the status CHANGED.

Author:
Robert J. Muller

Method Summary

          Close any resources allocated by the Command.
 void update(java.sql.Connection connection, java.util.Collection<T> dtos, int size)
          An interface for a Command-pattern class that updates the contents of a collection of objects in the database.
 

Method Detail

update

void update(java.sql.Connection connection,
            java.util.Collection<T> dtos,
            int size)
            throws java.sql.SQLException,
                   BatchException
An interface for a Command-pattern class that updates the contents of a collection of objects in the database. The DTOs in the collection must contain values for the primary key and must have all modifiable fields set to reflect the complete, desired state for the object in the database, including any composite aggregate parts belonging to the object. The implementation must pre-process and post-process all composite parts regardless of the update status of the top-level DTO.

Parameters:
connection - the database connection with which to update the data
dtos - the data transfer objects containing the desired state of the objects
size - the size of the batches
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException - when there is a SQL error with an update
BatchException - when there is some kind of batch processing error

close

void close()
Close any resources allocated by the Command.
